title: mzPeak metadata instrument configurations
description: Describe the JSON format of instrument configurations used to acquire a mass spectrometry experiment

instrument_configuration.description: Describes a single instrument configuration that was used. Analogous to https://peptideatlas.org/tmp/mzML1.1.0.html#instrumentConfiguration

software_reference.description: The identifier for a software that was associated with the data acquisition process.

identifier.description: A unique identifier for this instrument configuration.

component_type.description: Describes an instrument component like the ion source, mass analyzer, or detector
The kind of component this is

order.description: The order in which the analytes travels through the component

parameters.description: Additional parameters describing this component, like the particular hardware type or components
